016package org.lifstools.jmzqc;
017
018import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonFactoryBuilder;
019import java.io.IOException;
020import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.*;
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.module.SimpleModule;
022import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParser;
023import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
024import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.json.JsonReadFeature;
025import java.io.File;
026import java.io.InputStream;
027import java.net.MalformedURLException;
028import java.net.URL;
029import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
030import java.nio.file.Files;
031import java.nio.file.StandardOpenOption;
032import java.time.OffsetDateTime;
033import java.time.OffsetTime;
034import java.time.ZoneOffset;
035import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
036import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
037import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatterBuilder;
038import java.time.temporal.ChronoField;
039
040/**
041 * Provides convenience functions to parse date and time strings and to
042 * serialize and deserialize mzQC from and to a variety of sources.
043 */
044public class Converter {
045    // Date-time helpers
046
047    private static final DateTimeFormatter DATE_TIME_FORMATTER = new DateTimeFormatterBuilder()
048            .appendOptional(DateTimeFormatter.ISO_DATE_TIME)
049            .appendOptional(DateTimeFormatter.ISO_OFFSET_DATE_TIME)
050            .appendOptional(DateTimeFormatter.ISO_INSTANT)
051            .appendOptional(DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SX"))
052            .appendOptional(DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssX"))
053            .appendOptional(DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"))
054            .toFormatter()
055            .withZone(ZoneOffset.UTC);
056
057    /**
058     * Parse a date and time string using the default date and time formatter.
059     * @param str the date time string
060     * @return an {@link OffsetDateTime} object.
061     */
062    public static OffsetDateTime parseDateTimeString(String str) {
063        return ZonedDateTime.from(Converter.DATE_TIME_FORMATTER.parse(str)).toOffsetDateTime();
064    }
065
066    private static final DateTimeFormatter TIME_FORMATTER = new DateTimeFormatterBuilder()
067            .appendOptional(DateTimeFormatter.ISO_TIME)
068            .appendOptional(DateTimeFormatter.ISO_OFFSET_TIME)
069            .parseDefaulting(ChronoField.YEAR, 2020)
070            .parseDefaulting(ChronoField.MONTH_OF_YEAR, 1)
071            .parseDefaulting(ChronoField.DAY_OF_MONTH, 1)
072            .toFormatter()
073            .withZone(ZoneOffset.UTC);
074
075    /**
076     * Parse a time string using the default time formatter.
077     *
078     * @param str the time string
079     * @return an {@link OffsetTime} object.
080     */
081    public static OffsetTime parseTimeString(String str) {
082        return ZonedDateTime.from(Converter.TIME_FORMATTER.parse(str)).toOffsetDateTime().toOffsetTime();
083    }
084    // Serialize/deserialize helpers
085
086    /**
087     * Return a Coordinate holding an MzQC object from a file.
088     *
089     * @param file the file containing the mzQC json data.
090     * @return {@link Coordinate} holding the MzQC object.
091     * @throws IOException
092     */
093    public static Coordinate fromFile(File file) throws IOException {
094        return fromJsonString(Files.readString(file.toPath(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
095    }
096
097    /**
098     * Return a Coordinate holding an MzQC object from a URL.
099     *
100     * @param url the url from where to load the mzQC json data.
101     * @return {@link Coordinate} holding the MzQC object.
102     * @throws IOException
103     */
104    public static Coordinate fromUrl(URL url) throws IOException {
105        try ( InputStream in = url.openStream()) {
106            byte[] bytes = in.readAllBytes();
107            return fromJsonString(new String(bytes, StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
108        }
109    }
110
111    /**
112     * Return a Coordinate holding an MzQC object from a URL string.
113     *
114     * @param urlString the urlString from where to load the mzQC json data.
115     * @return {@link Coordinate} holding the MzQC object.
116     * @throws IOException
117     */
118    public static Coordinate fromUrlString(String urlString) throws MalformedURLException, IOException {
119        URL url = new URL(urlString);
120        return fromUrl(url);
121    }
122
123    /**
124     * Return a Coordinate holding an MzQC object from a string holding the JSON
125     * representation of an mzQC data.
126     *
127     * @param json the string containing the mzQC json data.
128     * @return {@link Coordinate} holding the MzQC object.
129     * @throws IOException
130     */
131    public static Coordinate fromJsonString(String json) throws IOException {
132        return getObjectReader().readValue(json);
133    }
134
135    /**
136     * Serialize the Coordinate holding an MzQC object to a JSON string.
137     *
138     * @param obj the coordinate
139     * @return an (unformatted) JSON string representation.
140     * @throws JsonProcessingException
141     */
142    public static String toJsonString(Coordinate obj) throws JsonProcessingException {
143        return getObjectWriter().writeValueAsString(obj);
144    }
145
146    /**
147     * Serialize the Coordinate holding an MzQC object to a file containing the
148     * data as a JSON string.
149     *
150     * @param obj the coordinate
151     * @param file the file to write to
152     * @return an (unformatted) JSON string representation.
153     * @throws JsonProcessingException
154     */
155    public static File toJsonFile(Coordinate obj, File file) throws JsonProcessingException, IOException {
156        return Files.writeString(file.toPath(), toJsonString(obj), StandardCharsets.UTF_8, StandardOpenOption.CREATE, StandardOpenOption.TRUNCATE_EXISTING).toFile();
157    }
158
159    private static ObjectReader reader;
160    private static ObjectWriter writer;
161
162    private static void instantiateMapper() {
163        JsonFactoryBuilder jfb = new JsonFactoryBuilder().
164                enable(JsonReadFeature.ALLOW_TRAILING_COMMA);
165        ObjectMapper mapper = new ObjectMapper(jfb.build());
166        mapper.findAndRegisterModules();
167        mapper.configure(SerializationFeature.WRITE_DATES_AS_TIMESTAMPS, false);
168        mapper.configure(JsonParser.Feature.ALLOW_COMMENTS, true);
169        SimpleModule module = new SimpleModule();
170        module.addDeserializer(OffsetDateTime.class, new JsonDeserializer<OffsetDateTime>() {
171            @Override
172            public OffsetDateTime deserialize(JsonParser jsonParser, DeserializationContext deserializationContext) throws IOException, JsonProcessingException {
173                String value = jsonParser.getText();
174                return Converter.parseDateTimeString(value);
175            }
176        });
177        mapper.registerModule(module);
178        reader = mapper.readerFor(Coordinate.class);
179        writer = mapper.writerFor(Coordinate.class);
180    }
181
182    private static ObjectReader getObjectReader() {
183        if (reader == null) {
184            instantiateMapper();
185        }
186        return reader;
187    }
188
189    private static ObjectWriter getObjectWriter() {
190        if (writer == null) {
191            instantiateMapper();
192        }
193        return writer;
194    }
195}
